intent_atoms.description: Recognize sample encryption placeholder boxes (senc, saio, saiz) during fragment parsing and record their offsets/sizes for CLI/UI consumers without attempting decryption.
Child boxes must not exceed parent ranges; overlapping payloads are flagged for CLI/UI surfaces.
Global flags now surface validation presets, aliases, and per‑rule overrides across all commands with metadata printing and JSON embedding.
The system must always enforce that child boxes cannot exceed parent ranges and overlapping payloads are detected.

functional_units.name: Sample Encryption Placeholder Parsing
functional_units.description: Recognizes senc, saio, and saiz boxes during fragment parsing, records their offsets/sizes, and surfaces presence to CLI/UI without attempting decryption.

functional_units.name: Enforce Parent Containment and Non-Overlap Validation
functional_units.description: Validates that child boxes do not exceed parent ranges and flags overlapping payloads for CLI/UI surfaces.

functional_units.name: Validation Preset CLI Wiring
functional_units.description: Provides global flags for presets, aliases, and per-rule overrides across all commands, with metadata printing and JSON embedding.

functional_units.name: Validation Export Metadata Enhancements
functional_units.description: CLI commands print preset metadata; JSON exports embed active preset and disabled rule IDs; batch summaries filter disabled rules.

functional_units.name: Real-World Assets Licensing Management
functional_units.description: Manages secure licensing for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures to replace synthetic payloads and refresh regression baselines.

functional_units.name: Codec Validation Coverage Expansion
functional_units.description: Expands end-to-end codec validation coverage as documented in the task archive.
